name: rsm-webflow-scripts
description: Script loader system for Webflow + Netlify deployment

scripts.build:dev: mkdir -p dist && cp -r js dist/ && cp rsm-loader.js dist/ && cp homepage-loader.js dist/ && cp dev-helper.js dist/
scripts.dev:localhost: npm run build:dev && echo 'Starting localhost server on port 5000...' && echo 'Set localStorage.setItem("env", "true") in browser console to use localhost files' && python3 -m http.server 5000
